Bare Bones.name: Bare Bones
Bare Bones.description:
When you choose not to equip armor, you have a base Armor Score of 3 + your Strength and use the following as your base damage thresholds:

  • Tier 1: 9/19
  • Tier 2: 11/24
  • Tier 3: 13/31
  • Tier 4: 15/38

8ze88zUwdkQSKKJq.name: Bare Bones
8ze88zUwdkQSKKJq.description:
When you choose not to equip armor, you have a base Armor Score of 3 + your Strength and use the following as your base damage thresholds:

  • Tier 1: 9/19
  • Tier 2: 11/24
  • Tier 3: 13/31
  • Tier 4: 15/38

s8KtTIngTjnOlaTP.name: Physical
s8KtTIngTjnOlaTP.description: You can't mark an Armor Slot to reduce magic damage.

J1MCpcfXByKaSSgx.name: Impenetrable
J1MCpcfXByKaSSgx.description: Once per short rest, when you would mark your last Hit Point, you can instead mark a Stress.

8PD5JQuS05IA6HJT.name: Slow Time
8PD5JQuS05IA6HJT.description: Mark an Armor Slot to roll a d4 and add its result as a bonus to your Evasion against an incoming attack.

L8mHf4A8SylyxsMH.name: Burn
L8mHf4A8SylyxsMH.description: When an adversary attacks you within Melee range, they mark a Stress.

QIefVb73cm9gYju8.name: Fortified
QIefVb73cm9gYju8.description: When you mark an Armor Slot, you reduce the severity of an attack by two thresholds instead of one.

IzM88FIxQ35P5VB2.name: Resilient
IzM88FIxQ35P5VB2.description: Before you mark your last Armor Slot, roll a d6. On a result of 6, reduce the severity by one threshold without marking an Armor Slot.

P3aCN8PQgPXP4C9M.name: Reinforced
P3aCN8PQgPXP4C9M.description: When you mark your last Armor Slot, increase your damage thresholds by +2 until you clear at least 1 Armor Slot.

3n4O7PyAWMEFdr5p.name: Magical
3n4O7PyAWMEFdr5p.description: You can't mark an Armor Slot to reduce physical damage.

QRTnCYxJfuJHdnyV.name: Hope
QRTnCYxJfuJHdnyV.description: When you would spend a Hope, you can mark an Armor Slot instead.

37KLF2bim9nRdPTU.name: Pain
37KLF2bim9nRdPTU.description: Each time you mark an Armor Slot, you must mark a Stress.

Nn33zCIcWe6LQMDH.name: Shift
Nn33zCIcWe6LQMDH.description: When you are targeted for an attack, you can mark an Armor Slot to give the attack roll against you disadvantage.

rkrqlwqtR9REgRx7.name: Difficult
rkrqlwqtR9REgRx7.description: -1 to all character traits and Evasion

V8CcTcVAIxHq8KNd.name: Sharp
V8CcTcVAIxHq8KNd.description: On a successful attack against a target within Melee range, add a d4 to the damage roll.

Ch6IhuPewBeseGez.name: Quiet
Ch6IhuPewBeseGez.description: You gain a +2 bonus to rolls you make to move silently.

sY3W5JYspN5Du5ag.name: Truthseeking
sY3W5JYspN5Du5ag.description: This armor glows when another creature within Close range tells a lie.

xGxqTCO8MjNq5Cw6.name: Warded
xGxqTCO8MjNq5Cw6.description: You reduce incoming magic damage by your Armor Score before applying it to your damage thresholds.
